name: Dispersal of pelagic organisms of the Belgian Continental Shelf
description: Study of the dispersion and dispersalmechanisms of pelagic keyspecies on the Belgian Continental Shelf (BCS). Thefocus of the dataset is on those species that have a pelagic life-style or have pelagiclarvae, mainly clupeidae. The Belgian coastal waters are internationally very important areas for a number of sea and coastal birds. Studying thedistribution patterns of the possible food sources (i.c. Pelagic fish) of these birds will lead to a better understanding of their spatialdistributionpatterns. Sampling is done with theZeeleeuw R.V. Underway data is registrated in MIDAS.
